unnormalised: Ek vhodd ani dhadd Indian lagin vo ek corporate karyakram yevjitai? Yogya zaga nivddop khub mhotvachem. Amche veg-vegllea desant invite kiteak dakttoch zata tem sodium-ia, khas korun. Hem article veg-vegllea zagancher invite kiteak bore bhaxen dakttoch zatat techer kendrit kortolem, zatiche invite tumni dakoylach bhaxen pavtole. Yaad dovortat, nirmalltai gungurpann thamboyta.
normalised: Tujea dolleant bori moti Indiachi laginachi vostadki iek corporate event asa? योग्य जाग्यांची निवड खूब म्हत्वाचे. आमचो देश वेगळेपणान भरला आसल्यान, आमकां योग्य रितीन आमंत्रणां कसो धाडची पडटा, तें पळोवया. हे लेखान वेगवेगळ्या जाग्यांचेर आमंत्रणां कशे योग्य रितीन धाडचे हाचेर लक्ष केंद्रीत करतले, जेणे करून तुमचीं आमंत्रणां जशी जाय तशीं पावतलीं. लक्षात दवरात, स्पश्टतायेन गोंदळ टाळटात.

unnormalised: Poilech, zaga koxem asa tem vichar korat. Tem 5-starchi hotel asa kiteak, The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai, Maharashtra, 400001 sarkhem? Vo "Shanti Niketan Farms, Gurgaon, Haryana, 122001" sarkhem vhodd farmhouse? Kitli mahiti zai ti bodlot. Hotels khatir, "The Ballroom, The Taj Mahal Palace" sarkhem khas banquet hallachem nanv ullekh korop ani pura address diop suchoytat. Farmhousesak chodd korun nirdisht rastyachem address nasta, tekhon laginchim chin'ham mhotvachim.
normalised: पयलीं, जाग्याचो प्रकार विचारांत घेयात. ती पांच तार्‍यांची हॉटेल आसा काय, जशीं The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai, Maharashtra, char lakh ek? वो Shanti Niketan Farms, Gurgaon, Haryana, ek lakh vis hajar ek sarkhem fankavpi xer? गरजेची तपशील पातळी बदलता. हॉटेल खातीर, "The Ballroom, The Taj Mahal Palace" सारकें खाशेलें बेंक्वेट हॉल आनी पुराय पत्तो सांगपाची शिफारस करतात. शेतघरां कडेन खूबदां अचूक रस्ते पत्ते नासतात, देखून लागींचीं खुणा म्हत्वाचीं.

unnormalised: "Pragati Maidan, New Delhi, 110001" sarkhea convention centresant karyakramanchea invitek address kortana nirdishttaechi goroz asta. Complexantlea khas hall vo pavilionacho ullekh korat, zoxem "Hall No. 5, Pragati Maidan". Zagear karyakramachea coordinatoracho contact number invite daktach meulot zalear to molacho zaunk xakta, zoxem "Contact: Mr. Sharma, 9876543210".
normalised: "Pragati Maidan, New Delhi, ek lakh dha hajar ek" सारक्या convention centeracher eventakhatir amantrannam patto dita tumkam bariksan dhyan divpachi goroz asa. Sankulan bhitarllya khaxellya hallacho vo pavilionacho ullekh kara, zoso "Hall Number panch, Pragati Maidan". Zagyavellya event coordinatorakhatir ek contact number melloun gheuncho zata, jem mellovpeankhatir khub molachem zaunk xakta, zoxem "Contact: Mister Sharma, nau ath sat so panch char tin don ek shunya".

unnormalised: Community halls, chodd korun dhormik ritinchea karyakramak vo lhan sobham khatir vaportat, ek veglo chall dita. Address itle formal nasunk xaktat, zoxem "Sai Baba Temple Hall, Shirdi, Maharashtra, 423109". Hea vellar, laginchim vhodd rastem vo chin'ham invite dhaktach melunk upkarta. Sthallik ullekh hanga mhotvache.
normalised: Community halls, zanche vapur khub pavti dharmik karyank vo lhan zomatinkhatir zatat, ek vegllench avhaan ubem kortat. Patte kom formal asunk xaktat, zoxem "Sai Baba Temple Hall, Shirdi, Maharashtra, char lakh teis hajar ek xe nau". Oxa kexancher, lagicho mukhel rosto vo khunna mellyo zalear tumchea soiryank zago sopo mellovpak modot zatli. Hangasor sthanik ullek mukhel asat.

unnormalised: Bairach zageam khatir zoxem beaches vo parks, nirmall margdarshan mhotvachem zata. "Juhu Beach (main entrance laginch), Mumbai, Maharashtra, 400049" hem apunn purai na. Zata zalear GPS coordinates diyat, vo bore prosidd zagear than cholopachim margdarshan vistaren diyat. "Western Express Highway gheiat, Juhu Circle-cher exit gheiat..." khub upkarcha zata.
normalised: Doryaveler vo udhyana sarkea bhairchea zagakhatir, spaxht disha mukhel zata. "Juhu Beach (mukhel darvajea lagim), Mumbai, Maharashtra, char lakh charpanch" sarkem ektench purnn zaina. Zata zalear G-P-S निर्देशांक di vo bori vollkh asl'le toponavali pasun survat korun vahan cholovpachi mahiti di. "Western Express Highway gheun, Juhu Circleacher eksit ghea…" khub upayogi zaunk xakta.

unnormalised: Nimannem, uch'ch mukh udd'dex hem sadem: tumche invite koslich tras dina zagear pautat tem nischit korop. Tumchea addressak double-check korat, sambandhit contact mahiti dhalat, ani hea zageak vollkh naslolo monis kaso marg kaddtolo tem vichar korat. Uprant ek lhan zaitik prayatn soglleanchem khub vell ani niraxe vachovnk xakta. Madot zalear "Chin'ham: XYZ Hospital laginch, ABC Road" dhalat!
normalised: Nimannem, ud'dex sopo asa: tumche soire kosliuy tras nasta zagyar pauchek zata titlem korunk zai. Tumche patte porthun chek korat, sangata contactache tapxil mellyat, ani tumi tankam vollkh nasl'le zageak marg dakhovpachem vicharat gheum yeta. Thoddoso extra prayatn sodanch soglleank khub vell ani nirasha bhogoitolo. "Landmark: Near X-Y-Z Hospital, A-B-C Road" zoddun di, jem tankam modot kortolem!
